usage: Hand weights for strength training, toning, and resistance exercises at home, in fitness classes, or in a personal workout area.
key_features: Set of two 1 KG dumbbells for a total of 2 KG
Cast iron core with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Anti-slip neoprene surface for a secure, comfortable grip
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
Printed weight number on end caps for quick identification
Color-coded pink design to easily distinguish weight
Suitable for home gym, fitness classes, and resistance training
Non-toxic guarantee badge shown for added peace of mind
ai_description: Pair of pink KAKSS neoprene dumbbells, 1 KG each, with white weight markings and hexagonal ends to stop rolling. The non-slip coated surface offers a secure grip for home workouts, fitness classes, and light resistance training.
target_audience: Home exercisers, beginners, and fitness enthusiasts seeking light, easy-grip dumbbells for workouts, especially those preferring compact pink weights.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training - Pink
bullets: NEOPRENE COATED: Cast iron core with neoprene coating for durable, anti-slip grip on these neoprene dumbbells set hand weights.
SET OF TWO: Includes 2 pink dumbbells, 1 KG each (total 2 KG), ideal starter weights dumbbells set for home workouts.
SECURE HEX DESIGN: Hexagonal shape keeps each dumbbell in place, preventing rolling in your home gym weights area.
EASY IDENTIFICATION: Printed weight number and colour coded ends help you quickly pick the right dumbbell set during training.
HOME GYM USE: Great gym equipment for resistance training, fitness classes and gym weights for home for women and men.
description_snippet: Build strength and add light resistance to your workouts with this Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG set, featuring two 1 KG hand weights in a vibrant pink colour. Designed for home gym sessions, fitness classes and everyday exercise, this compact dumbbell set is ideal for beginners, toning routines
